configuration.name: widget_08784239179307609
configuration.stem: Which statement summarizes the main similarity between information processing in an animal and information processing in a computer?

feedBack.finalWrongHint: Although the two systems are very different, the overall flow of input and output are similar for information processing in both systems.

options.name: mc-opt-item-028151441155932844
options.hint: Think again about the two processes. How are they different? How are they similar?

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.hint: Think again about the two processes. How are they different? How are they similar?

options.name: _widget_-06560350007727807
options.hint: Think again about the two processes. How are they different? How are they similar?
options.text: The amount of time required is similar.

options.name: _widget_-08458068301092179
options.text: The overall flow of cause and effect is similar.
